question: Bipasha Chakrabarti was recently appointed as the Communications Director of the which technological companyâ€™s Indian arm?
explanation:
Former Executive of CISCO, Bipasha Chakrabarti has been recently appointed as the new communications head of Facebook India.
Under her new role as the Communications Director at Facebook India, Bipasha would lead the corporate communications and public relations in India. She will handle the communications sector for both Facebook and Instagram in the country.
